I also thought the "Fantasy" project was getting too crowded so created this. For Fun :-)

For more behind the scenes info on our work, check out https://flightsimsquadron.com/

To manage expectations, they are probably the wrong scale, have no animation, no working interior or correct sound, and are probably rubbish to fly .... 

So should probably really not be used for any purpose other than to take some screenshots for fun :-)

First one: Paper Bird :-)
